query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_upgrades,
  COUNT(DISTINCT playerName) as unique_players,
  COUNT(DISTINCT userName) as unique_users,
  SUM(CASE WHEN upgradeType = 'Badge' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as badge_upgrades,
  SUM(CASE WHEN upgradeType = 'Attribute' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as attribute_upgrades
FROM upgrade_log;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user waCuRew5RKYFFjj.root --database DS68jwRuNTWiz9tNrw6KXW --execute SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_upgrades,
  COUNT(DISTINCT playerName) as unique_players,
  COUNT(DISTINCT userName) as unique_users,
  SUM(CASE WHEN upgradeType = 'Badge' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as badge_upgrades,
  SUM(CASE WHEN upgradeType = 'Attribute' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as attribute_upgrades
FROM upgrade_log;
